oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Winter grazing forage crops - An introduction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Leavy, Elaine
Nolan, Stephen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pasture and forage crops
Beef cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Winter grazing forage crops are being successfully grown on organic farms throughout Ireland, from Cork to Donegal. In this article we will discuss the overall role, establishment and management of forage crops in organic livestock production.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Leavy, Elaine and Nolan, Stephen (2015) Winter grazing forage crops - An introduction. Organic Matters, 15 June 2015, pp. 1-6.
